x36_s1_e0: [Timer] Start timer
x36_s1_e1: [Debug] Popcorn creation

x36_s3: Attack: End

x36_s5_w0: [Attack] Blade dash cancellation
x36_s6: End state

x38: [LIB] partner down

x39: [LIB] Damage action: Terrain damage
